inputs.plotConflict: he is looking for his lost teddy bear

chatGPTOutput:
Title: Jeremy's Castle Adventure

Page 1:
In a big, old castle, there lived a boy named Jeremy.

Page 2:
Jeremy wore a green shirt and loved his teddy bear.

Page 3:
One day, Jeremy's teddy bear went missing.

Page 4:
Jeremy looked under his bed, but it wasn't there.

Page 5:
He checked behind the curtains, but it wasn't there either.

Page 6:
Jeremy searched in the kitchen, but still no teddy bear.

Page 7:
He climbed the stairs to the big, tall tower.

Page 8:
At the top, Jeremy found a big, wooden chest.

Page 9:
He opened the chest and saw his teddy bear inside!

Page 10:
Jeremy hugged his teddy bear tight.

Page 11:
He felt happy to have his friend back.

Page 12:
Jeremy learned that looking carefully helps find lost things.
storyText:
Title: Jeremy's Castle Adventure

Page 1:
In a big, old castle, there lived a boy named Jeremy.

Page 2:
Jeremy loved his teddy bear.

Page 3:
One day, Jeremy's teddy bear went missing.

Page 4:
Jeremy looked under his bed, but it wasn't there.

Page 5:
He checked behind the curtains, but it wasn't there either.

Page 6:
Jeremy searched in the kitchen, but still no teddy bear.

Page 7:
He climbed the stairs to the big, tall tower.

Page 8:
At the top, Jeremy found a big, wooden chest.

Page 9:
He opened the chest and saw his teddy bear inside!

Page 10:
Jeremy hugged his teddy bear tight.

Page 11:
He felt happy to have his friend back.

Page 12:
Jeremy learned that looking carefully helps find lost things.
